title: Little Agency
points: Worked mainly on custom wordpress themes using ACF.
Worked with a variety of different languages and frameworks such as wordpress, craft, vue and laravel
Interfaced with clients and provided solution requests

title: Netmatters
points: Engineered and maintained major features on fullstack application primarily in laravel across multiple different versions and PHP versions.
Maintained and updated legacy code projects
Communicate with multi-disciplinary teams of engineers, designers, producers, and clients on a daily basis
